verses.roman:
śuni' prabhu kaila tāṅra caraṇa vandana
bhaya pāñā prabhu-pāya padilā brāhmaṇa

synonyms: śuni'—after hearing; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kaila—did; tāṅra—of him; caraṇa vandana—worshiping the feet; bhaya pāñā—being afraid; prabhu-paya—at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; paḍilā—fell down; brāhmaṇa—the brāhmaṇa.
translation: As soon as Caitanya Mahāprabhu heard about Mādhavendra Purī's relationship with the brāhmaṇa, He immediately offered obeisances at his feet. Becoming fearful, the brāhmaṇa also immediately fell at the Lord's feet.
